CustomField.formula: IF( OR( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_2_1__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_2_2__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_2_3__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_2_4__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_2_5__c))) ), MAX( VALUE(TEXT(Score_2_1__c)), VALUE(TEXT(Score_2_2__c)), VALUE(TEXT(Score_2_3__c)), VALUE(TEXT(Score_2_4__c)), VALUE(TEXT(Score_2_5__c)) ), NULL )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The total score from the Competition section. Only calculated where all scores are completed.
CustomField.label: Competition Score
